
### exercise  {.smaller}

<!-- \lstset{language=C,style=smaller} -->
 
```
pthread_barrier_t barrier; int x = 0, y = 0;
void thread_one() {
    y = 10;
    pthread_barrier_wait(&barrier);
    y = x + y;
    pthread_barrier_wait(&barrier);
    pthread_barrier_wait(&barrier);
    printf("%d %d\n", x, y);
}
void thread_two() {
    x = 20;
    pthread_barrier_wait(&barrier);
    pthread_barrier_wait(&barrier);
    x = x + y;
    pthread_barrier_wait(&barrier);
}

```
